description: Base controller for pages that use the Dashmix admin template. It provides a helper method to render views within the standard layout.

methods.name: renderDashmix
methods.description: Renders a given view file within the Dashmix template. It sets up page variables, filters navigation by user role, and includes the main layout file.

parameters.name: viewPath
parameters.description: The absolute path to the content view file.

parameters.name: pageDescription
parameters.description: The meta description for the page.

parameters.name: mainNav
parameters.description: A custom navigation array to override the default.

parameters.name: breadcrumbs
parameters.description: An array to generate page breadcrumbs.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An associative array of data to be extracted and made available to the view file.

parameters.name: layoutPath
parameters.description: The absolute path to a custom layout file to use instead of the default dashmix_layout.php.
